org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

Interface Request<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the resource type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RetrievalRequest<T>, SingleRequest<T>

    public interface Request<T>
    The top level request wrapper to provide possibility to isolate a remote call to standalone object.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request<T> config(RequestCredential credential)
      Apply request specific credential and configuration to this call.
      T execute()
      Execute a remote call based on the underlying query(Class) instance.
      T execute(Locale locale)
      Execute a remote call with specified locale.
      T execute(Map<String,Object> parameters)
      Execute a remote call with additional resource parameters.
      T execute(Map<String,Object> parameters, Locale locale)
      Execute a remote call with additional resource parameters or locale.
      <Q> Q query(Class<Q> type)
      Returns the underlying request instance in order to configure an additional query parameters or provide specific request configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        <Q> Q query(Class<Q> type)
        Returns the underlying request instance in order to configure an additional query parameters or provide specific request configuration.
        Type Parameters:
        Q - the class type of underlying request to be cast
        Parameters:
        type - the underlying request related to concrete API implementation
        Returns:
        the underlying request object
        Throws:
        ClassCastException

      • execute

        T execute()
        Execute a remote call based on the underlying query(Class) instance.
        Returns:
        the resource as a result of the remote call

      • execute

        T execute(Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Execute a remote call with additional resource parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the optional resource parameters
        Returns:
        the resource as a result of the remote call

      • execute

        T execute(Locale locale)
        Execute a remote call with specified locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - the language the client has configured to prefer in results if applicable
        Returns:
        the resource as a result of the remote call

      • execute

        T execute(Map<String,Object> parameters,
        Locale locale)
        Execute a remote call with additional resource parameters or locale.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the optional resource parameters
        locale - the language the client has configured to prefer in results if applicable
        Returns:
        the resource as a result of the remote call

      • config

        Request<T> config(RequestCredential credential)
        Apply request specific credential and configuration to this call. The underlying API must support (at least partially) this functionality otherwise call to this method will be ignored and default value of target API will be used.
        Parameters:
        credential - the credential and configuration to be applied to this request
        Returns:
        this request to chain calls
